contentList.content: You achieve unparalleled mastery with your weapons, merging them into an extension of your being.
Gain the effects of Fighting Style: Two-Weapon Fighting.
Perform two weapon attacks in quick succession. Can only be used wielding a weapon in each hand.
Infuse your melee weapons to deal an additional [1] damage with a chosen damage type.
Gain the effects of Extra Attack.
Strike all nearby creatures with your blades.
Through disciplined training of mind, body, and spirit, ascetic mystics can perform both devastating psionics and crushing blows.

Your unarmed attacks deal [1], and you use your Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> for unarmed attack and damage rolls. Additionally, you can make an unarmed attack as a bonus action.

Your reflexes are as effective as any armour. While not wearing armour, you add your Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
Your unarmed attacks will deal Psychic damage.
Your unarmed attacks will deal Force damage.
After spending Psi Points, gain stacks of Psionic Resonance, increasing the damage of your next successful unarmed attack by [1] per stack.
Next unarmed attack will deal an additional [1].
After casting a psionic discipline, you can make an unarmed strike for free. Once per turn.
Able to make an unarmed strike for free.
At the start of each combat, regain [1] Psi Points.
Also known as Blades, mystics of this order forsake mental training and instead focus on weapons, using their psionics to enhance their attacks.
Learn a Fighting Style of your choice.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Weapon Proficiency</LSTag> with Martial Weapons and <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Medium Armour, Heavy Armour and Shields.

When wielding a weapon that matches your chosen Fighting Style from Mystic Arsenal, you use your Intelligence Modifier for attack and damage rolls. Additionally, gain an additional ability based on the Fighting Style chosen from Mystic Arsenal.

- Great Weapon Fighting: Psychic Smite
- Dueling: Psychic Flourish
- Archery: Psychic Barrage
- Thrown Weapon Fighting: Psychic Shockwave
This weapon uses the wielder's Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> for <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Deliver a crushing slam infused with psi.
Strike foes in an arc and gain [1] increased <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> and increasing your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by [2] until your next turn.
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> increased by [1]. <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> increased by [2].
Shoot up to [1] times. Each shot deals half damage.
Unleash a psychic shockwave in a targeted area.

Enter a state of heightened psionic focus. You gain the benefits of <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack_2">Improved Extra Attack</LSTag>, [1] increased <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> and a bonus to weapon attack and damage rolls equal to your Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
Able to attack three times. [1] increased movement speed. +[2] to weapon attack and damage rolls.
You learn to manipulate the fundamental forces that hold things together, granting you a semblance of control over gravity.
Channel gravitational energy onto a creature, possibly knocking it <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Alter a creature's gravity, modifying their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>, jumping distance and fall damage taken.
Reduce a creature's gravity, increasing their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1], jumping distance by [2] and negating fall damage.
Increase a creature's gravity, reducing their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1], jumping distance by [2] and increasing fall damage by [3] times.
Experiencing reduced gravity. <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> increased by [1], jumping distance increased by [2] and fall damage negated.
Experiencing increased gravity. <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> reduced by [1], jumping distance reduced by [2] and fall damage is increased by [3] times.
Exert a powerful gravitational force in a targeted area. Creatures within have their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> halved.

Warp space around a friendly creature, turning them into a gravitational beacon. Enemies within [1] take [2] per turn, are pulled inwards and their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is halved.

Turned into a miniature black hole.

Enemies within [1] take [2] per turn, are pulled inwards and their movement speed is halved.

On a successful save, targets still take half damage.

Suffering from an immense gravitational pull.

Takes [1] per turn, is pulled towards the source and movement speed is halved.

Still takes half damage on successful Saving Throw.

Removed upon leaving the area.
Compress and distort space around an area, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLOW">Slowing</LSTag> creatures within.
You reach out with your mind and grasp the threads of time themselves, allowing you to bend reality and fate to your whims.

Target yourself or an ally to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HASTE">Hastened</LSTag>: gain an action, become faster and gain +2 to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>. You become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HASTE_LETHARGY">Lethargic</LSTag> for one turn afterwards.

Creature has a +2 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, its <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is doubled, and it can take one additional action per turn.
When this condition ends, the affected creature becomes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HASTE_LETHARGY">Lethargic</LSTag>.

Nudge fate in a creature's favour, giving them Advantage on Saving Throws and imposing Disadvantage on incoming attacks.

When a spell or effect would deal half damage on a successful Dexterity Saving Throw, it deals no damage if the target succeeds, and only half damage they fail.

Once affected, a creature will become immune to this effect for 1 turn.

Advantage on Saving Throws. Incoming attacks have Disadvantage.

When a spell or effect would deal half damage on a successful Dexterity Saving Throw, it deals no damage on success, and only half damage on fail.
Affected entity can't receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MYSTIC_TWIST_OF_FATE">Twist of Fate</LSTag>.
When an enemy attacks a nearby ally, impose <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on the <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BANISHED">Banish</LSTag> a creature from the timeline.

Banished from the timeline.

Can't be targeted. Can't move or take actions, bonus actions, or reactions.

Ward a creature from harm, storing damage taken. When this spell ends, they will regain hit points equal to the damage stored.

This spell will automatically end if the creature reaches [1]. Affected creatures can choose to prematurely end this spell on their turn.
Storing damage taken. When this effect ends or when reduced to [1], regain hit points equal to the damage stored.
End the Chronoward condition on yourself.
Create a zone in which time moves faster: creatures within are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MYSTIC_BORROWED_TIME_HASTE">Hastened</LSTag>.
Materialized a zone in which creatures are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MYSTIC_BORROWED_TIME_HASTE">Hastened</LSTag> while inside.
You cast your mind out into the wilderness, enhancing your ability to track and strike down your prey.
Mark a creature as your quarry to deal an additional [1] whenever you damage it.
Affected entity suffers an additional [1] if the spellcaster damages it.
When this creature damages its quarry, it deals an additional [1].
If the target dies before the spell ends, you can mark a new creature without expending Psi Points.
When you attack your quarry, you deal an additional [1].
Shift your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MYSTIC_NOMADS_MARK">Nomad's Mark</LSTag> to a new creature without using Psi Points.
Can use a bonus action to reapply Nomad's Mark to another target.

Heighten your and nearby allies' senses: gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against a target if one of your allies is within [1] of the target and isn't Incapacitated.

Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against a target if one of its allies is within [1] of the target and isn't Incapacitated.
You focus your mind on peace and serenity, bringing relaxation and rest to yourself and others.

Gain immunity to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEP">Sleep</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysed</LSTag>.

Immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEP">Sleep</LSTag>. <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysed</LSTag>.
Induce <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEP">sleep</LSTag> onto creatures. Select targets up to a combined [1].
Appease a creature, removing and preventing any <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, or enraged effects.
Can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, and can't <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Rage">Rage</LSTag>.
Exert an aura of peace. Nearby allies regain [1] each turn
At the end of each of their turns, allies regain [1].
At the end of your turn, regain [1].
Place an allied creature in restful sleep, granting them the benefits of a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.

Wake all nearby creatures from sleep. Allies receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MYSTIC_LUCID_DREAMING">Lucid Dreaming</LSTag> and enemies receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MYSTIC_SLEEP_PARALYSIS">Sleep Paralysis</LSTag>.
+[1] to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> increased by [2].
Release tranquilizing energy in an area, putting creatures to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEP">Sleep</LSTag>.
You wield psionic energy to alter and distort reality, creating optical illusions that distract foes.
Gain immunity against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>
Envelop yourself in a cloak of psychic static, Obscuring yourself to others.
Entity is Obscured by a cloak of psychic static.
Summon a simulacrum of yourself. You can swap places with it as if you are acting from its position.
Surround yourself with eerie illusory energy. After moving [1], you gain an illusory copy that makes you harder to hit.
Surrounded by eerie illusory energy. After moving [1], affected entity will gain an illusory copy of itself.
You and nearby allies each gain Mirror Images.
Create a shroud that distorts perception. Creatures within gain the effects of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Invisibility_Greater">Greater Invisibility</LSTag>.

Entity has Advantage on Attack Rolls. Attack Rolls against it have Disadvantage.

When interacting with items, casting spells or attacking, the entity needs to succeed a Stealth Check to maintain Invisibility. The check becomes harder with each successful attempt.
You learn to psionically manipulate blood, siphoning the life force from foes and strengthening yourself and allies.
Siphon blood from the target, healing you for half of the damage dealt.
Unleash an explosion of blood, healing you for half of the damage dealt.

Sacrifice your own blood for power, taking [1]. Your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> increases by [2] and you gain [3] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> at the start of each turn.
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> increased by [1]. At the start of each of your turns, gain [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>.

Empower the blood of nearby allies, giving them <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Strength, Dexterity and Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.

<LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Necrotic damage. <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Strength, Dexterity and Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
You channel psychic energy around yourself and outwards, bursting into a titanic rage and controlling the battlefield.
Gain immunity against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> or falling <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Immune to being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> or falling <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Infuriate a creature, forcing it to attack you on its next turn.
Cannot attack creatures other than the spellcaster.

Burst into a titanic rage. While raging, your melee attacks deal an additional [1].

You gain Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws. You use your Intelligence instead of Strength for Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

You gain Disadvantage on Saving Throws to maintain Concentration and your movement speed is reduced by [2].

Deals an additional [1] damage with melee and improvised weapons, and while throwing objects.

Has Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws. Uses Intelligence instead of Strength for Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

Has Disadvantage on Saving Throws to maintain Concentration. Movement speed decreased by [2].
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Rage ends early if the mystic hasn't attacked an enemy or taken damage since their last turn.
Cannot attack creatures other than the spellcaster.
You psionically reach out to the souls of other creatures, allowing you to rip it from their bodies, delivering a swift end.
Reducing a creature to [1] heals you for [2].
When you reduce a creature to [1], you regain [2].
Harvest a creature's soul. If it has half of its hit points or less, increase the damage to [1].
Pull a willing or unwilling creature towards you.
Sever a creature's soul from its body. If this reduces a target to 0 hit points, you regain an action and 5 Psi Points.

Doom a creature to certain death. While you remain within [1] of it, it cannot regain hit points, its <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is halved it will lose any <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistances</LSTag> it has.
Affected creature cannot regain hit points, its <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is halved and no longer has any <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistances</LSTag>.
You have learned to suppress all emotions on creatures, filling them with a sense of apathy and disinterest.
Gain immunity against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.
Immune against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="Charmed">Charmed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.
Unleash a wave of apathy on up to [1] creatures. Targets suffer <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Assault a creature with a flood of lethargy, preventing it from taking reactions. Additionally, it may only either move, take an action or bonus action.
Demoralize a creature, making it deal half damage with weapon attacks.
Affected creature deals half damage with weapon attacks.
Radiate an aura of indifference that compels enemies to do nothing. Enemies within the aura may drop their weapons, lose concentration and skip their turn entirely.
Emitting an aura of indifference. Nearby enemies may drop their weapons, lose concentration and skip their turn entirely.
You imbue your weapons with the essence of the winds, delivering elegant yet deadly techniques upon your foes.
TODO: Blessing of the Winds Description
TODO: Blessing of the Winds (Melee) Description
TODO: Blessing of the Winds (Melee) Status Description
TODO: Blessing of the Winds (Ranged) Description
TODO: Blessing of the Winds (Ranged) Status Description
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> increased by [1]. Moving doesn't trigger <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Recently struck by Steel Tempest. Cannot be targeted by Steel Tempest again until the current sequence is concluded.
TODO: Steel Tempest: Second Strike Description
TODO: Steel Tempest: Second Strike Status Description
TODO: Steel Tempest: Final Strike Description
TODO: Steel Tempest: Final Strike Status Description
Your mind reaches out into the stars, granting you control over astral bodies.
Hurl a mote of starlight. The next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> on this target has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
The next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> made against this creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Shine the light of the moon around you. Enemies will turn visible and will not be able to go Invisible.
Shedding dim light. Cannot be Invisible.

Create a massive solar explosion, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinding</LSTag> creatures caught in the blast. Creatures that are <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="SunlightSensitivity">sensitive to sunlight</LSTag> take an additional [1] and have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on this <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Materialize a path of stardust. Creatures traversing along the path can move without using their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>, but cannot act.
Can move without using <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>, but unable to act.
A violent storm of stars batter everyone in range, make the area <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>, while revealing any invisible creatures inside.
You attune yourself with the environment, allowing you to invoke the power of nature to your aid.
Launch toxic spines that poison the target, dealing [1] at the end of their turn.
Affected entity will take [1] at the end of their turn.
Throw a bundle of briars that stick to a creauture. Whenever it moves [1], it takes [2].
Whenever the affected creature moves [1], it will take [2].
Infuse a creature with restorative energy, causing them to regain [1] at the start of each turn.
Affected entity regains [1] at the start of each turn.
Recently taken Fire or Acid damage.
Grow brambles on a creature's skin, increasing their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by [1]. Whenever another creature hits it with a melee attack, they take [2].
Skin is protected by brambles. <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is increased by [1] and attackers will take [2] on a hit.
Cause a massive uprooting around you, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restraining</LSTag> all nearby enemies.
You tap into your own pride and confidence, lifting your allies' spirits and making your foes stumble carelessly.
Shield a creature with their own pride, granting them [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>.
Emitting an aura of disdain. Attacks of nearby allies deal an additional [1].
Near a mystic's aura of contempt. Attacks deal an additional [1].
You wield your psionic power to summon spectral appendages, enhancing your and allies' effectiveness in various ways.
Reduce the number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking by 1.
The number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking is reduced by 1.

Transcend your physical form, doubling the number of creatures you can target with psionic talents and disciplines. However, your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> will be reduced by [1] and your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> will be halved. You can end this effect at any time.

Affected entity has transcended their physical form. The number of creatures it can target with psionic talents and disciplines is doubled. <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> reduced by [1] and <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> halved.
End the Transcendence effect on yourself.
Brand a creature with a psychic sigil, raising one of their stats to [1], unless it is already higher.
Increase a creature's Strength to [1], unless it is already higher.
Affected entity's Strength is increased to [1], unless it is already higher.
Increase a creature's Dexterity to [1], unless it is already higher.
Affected entity's Dexterity is increased to [1], unless it is already higher.
Increase a creature's Constitution to [1], unless it is already higher.
Affected entity's Constitution is increased to [1], unless it is already higher.
Increase a creature's Intelligence to [1], unless it is already higher.
Affected entity's Intelligence is increased to [1], unless it is already higher.
Increase a creature's Wisdom to [1], unless it is already higher.
Affected entity's Wisdom is increased to [1], unless it is already higher.
Increase a creature's Charisma to [1], unless it is already higher.
Affected entity's Charisma is increased to [1], unless it is already higher.

Grant a creature a ghostly set of arms to aid them. Their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is increased by [1], their carrying capacity is doubled and they have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Additionally, it can choose to make weapon attacks as a bonus action.

Affected entity has been given a ghostly set of arms. <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> increased by [1], carrying capacity is doubled and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Additionally, it can choose to make weapon attacks as a bonus action.
Perform weapon attacks that normally cost an action as a bonus action.
You learn to use psionic energy to break the minds of others, causing them to descend into madness.
Gain immunity against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CONFUSION">Confused</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DOMINATE_PERSON">Dominated</LSTag>.
Immune to being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CONFUSION">Confused</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DOMINATE_PERSON">Dominated</LSTag>.
Leave a creature <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> and disoriented, without the ability to get up.

Affected entity can't move or take actions, bonus actions, or reactions, and has Disadvantage on Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws. Attacks made within [1] of it have Advantage against it.

At the end of its turn or when it takes damage, the entity can try to shake off the effect.
Inflict a maddening hysteria in a humanoid enemy, making them attack the creature closest to them (other than you), even if it's allied.
Afflicted with a maddening hysteria. Will attack the nearest creature, other than the spellcaster.
Make creatures in the area <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MYSTIC_PARANOIA">Paranoid</LSTag>. They cannot attack you. They cannot move or act.

Can't move or take actions, bonus actions, or reactions.

Removed by taking damage or when Helped.

Torment a creature with maddening whispers. It takes [1] per turn, cannot move, has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.

Affected entity is tormented by maddening whispers.

It takes [1] per turn, can't move, and has Disadvantage on Ability Checks and Attack Rolls.
You concentrate your mind on trickery and cunning, allowing you to deceive and swindle others with ease.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Sleight of Hand <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
<LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Sleight of Hand <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Assimilate one of the many faces among the noosphere, allowing you to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_DisguiseSelf">Disguise Self</LSTag>.
Affected entity can cast the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_DisguiseSelf">Disguise Self</LSTag> spell.
Your fingers move with unnatural agility, giving you a +[1] bonus to Sleight of Hand <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Affected entity has a +[1] bonus to Sleight of Hand <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.

When you are about to be hit by an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack</LSTag> or fail a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, you can reroll the die. Your attacker will then have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Bless a creature with incredible luck, granting them the benefits of the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Lucky_Unlock">Lucky</LSTag> feat.
Affected entity has the benefits of the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Lucky_Unlock">Lucky</LSTag> feat.
You tap into feelings of envy and desire, filling others with a crippling longing or fervent ambition.
Fill a creature with a hateful impulse, causing their weapon and unarmed attacks to deal an additional [1].
Affected entity deals an additional [1] with weapon and unarmed attacks.
Mark a creature as your nemesis, reducing their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by [1] and making them <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Psychic damage.
Affected entity has their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> reduced by [1] and is <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Psychic damage.

Fill a creature with a strong desire for success. Whenever they make an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag>, they cannot roll lower than a 10.

Filled with a strong desire for success. Whenever the affected creature makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag>, it cannot roll lower than a 10.
Radiate an aura of malice. Nearby allies will regain hit points equal to half of the damage they deal.
Emitting an aura of malice. Will regain hit points equal to half of the damage you deal.
Near a mystic's aura of spite. Will regain hit points equal to half of the damage you deal.
You extend your focus towards animals and wildlife, forming a deep psychic bond with them.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Animal Handling <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Gain the ability to comprehend and communicate with beasts.
Convince a beast not to attack you.
Summon your loyal eagle companion to your side.
Send your bestial companion on a rampage. It gains TODO: Bestial Might Description
Your mind reached a place it perhaps shouldn't have, allowing you to harness the insidious powers of unknowable eldritch horrors.
Briefly open a small rift to the worlds beyond.

Link yourself with another creature. Whenever you receive a boon from a psionic discipline, your partner also receives it. Additionally, whenever either of you regains hit points, the other regains the same amount.
Emit a discordant static that interrupts casting. Whenever a nearby enemy casts a spell or ends their turn concentrating, they take [1].
Emitting a discordant static. Nearby enemies will take [1] if they cast a spell or end their turn concentrating.
Affected entity will take [1] if it casts a spell or ends its turn concentrating.
Fully embrace the nature of entities from beyond. You are considered an Aberration and your psionic disciplines cost no Psi Points. When this effect ends, you will be reduced to 1 hit point.
Affected entity has no Psi Point costs and is considered an Aberration.
The least understood order, mystics of this order embrace the unpredictability of their own mind, letting loose wild psionic surges with even the most fleeting thought.
Your intrusive thoughts can manifest into wild Psionic Surges. After spending Psi Points on a psionic discipline, there is a chance to trigger a Psionic Surge.
After triggering a Psionic Surge, regain 1 Psi Point.
Adjust the likelihood of triggering a Psionic Surge.
Change your chaotic state to inert.
Change your chaotic state to stable.
Change your chaotic state to active.
Psionic Surges will trigger at a normal rate.
Change your chaotic state to volatile.
Change your chaotic state to dangerous.
Allies within [1] will be able to trigger a wild Psionic Surge when taking an action once per turn. Can be toggled on or off.
After triggering a Psionic Surge, regain 2 Psi Points.
After triggering a a Psionic Surge, there is a chance to regain a Psionic Mastery charge.
